keywords.name: H1
keywords.description: H1 is the most important heading tag. It should be used only once per page.

keywords.name: H2
keywords.description: H2 is the second most important heading tag. It should be used only once per page.

keywords.name: H3
keywords.description: H3 is the third most important heading tag. It should be used only once per page.

keywords.name: table
keywords.description: Table is used to display tabular data.

keywords.name: link
keywords.description: Link is used to display a link to another page.

keywords.name: image
keywords.description: Image is used to display an image.

keywords.name: music
keywords.description: Music is used to display a music file.

keywords.name: video
keywords.description: Video is used to display a video file.

keywords.name: code
keywords.description: Code is used to display a code snippet.

keywords.name: equation
keywords.description: Equation is used to display a mathematical equation.
